CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 1, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Big Splash - One of the biggest parties of the season was held at the Ritz Cafe recently in honor of "Shimmy," one of the Hill Distric's most colorful characters.  A large crowd attended, and plenty of champagne food was provided to keep the guests in a happy mood."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women, including one on left wearing gathered hat, houndstooth suit, and dark blouse, and two men, possibly including Clayton "Shimmy" Bandy in center, and Attorney Paul Jones, on right, gathered behind pushed together tables with  plaid tablecloths, and champagne glasses, possibly in the Ritz Cafe
